results.title: Impact of Single or Combined Drug Therapy on Bone Regeneration in Healthy and Osteoporotic Rats.
results.text_hl: Despite the expected effects on @DISEASE_Osteoporotic_Fractures @DISEASE_MESH:D058866 @@@osteoporotic bone@@@, our study did not confirm the hypothesized benefit of @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on bone regeneration in @<m>DISEASE_Atelosteogenesis_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535395 @@@osseous defects@@@ in healthy conditions.

citations.NLM: Shaheen MY, Basudan AM, Niazy AA, van den Beucken JJJP, Jansen JA, Alghamdi HS. Impact of Single or Combined Drug Therapy on Bone Regeneration in Healthy and Osteoporotic Rats. Tissue Eng Part A. 2021 May;27(9-10):572-581. PMID: 32838702
citations.BibTeX: @article{32838702, title={Impact of Single or Combined Drug Therapy on Bone Regeneration in Healthy and Osteoporotic Rats.}, author={Shaheen MY and Basudan AM and Niazy AA and van den Beucken JJJP and Jansen JA and Alghamdi HS}, journal={Tissue Eng Part A}, volume={27}, number={9-10}, pages={572-581}}

results.title: Simvastatin in polymer bioscaffold for bone regeneration. An in vitro and in vivo analysis.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: The study aimed to fabricate and test the biocompatibility of a @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@polylactic-co-glycolic acid@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@) based guided tissue regeneration membrane impregnated with '@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@' to promote sustained drug delivery near @<m>DISEASE_Atelosteogenesis_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535395 @@@osseous defects@@@ and evaluate the regenerative potential of the membrane histologically.

citations.NLM: Swati S, Gopalkrishna P, Nayak UY, Ginjupalli K, Hrishi TS, Chandrashekar C, R RA, K P, P L. Simvastatin in polymer bioscaffold for bone regeneration. An in vitro and in vivo analysis. Stomatologija. 2021;23(4):114-120. PMID: 35635523
citations.BibTeX: @article{35635523, title={Simvastatin in polymer bioscaffold for bone regeneration. An in vitro and in vivo analysis.}, author={Swati S and Gopalkrishna P and Nayak UY and Ginjupalli K and Hrishi TS and Chandrashekar C and R RA and K P and P L}, journal={Stomatologija}, volume={23}, number={4}, pages={114-120}}

results.title: Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to evaluated the potential of core-shell @CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@poly(D,l-lactide-co-glycolide)@@@-@CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Polylactic_Acid_Polyglycolic_Acid_Copolymer @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077182 @@@PLGA@@@-@CHEMICAL_Chitosan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D048271 @@@chitosan@@@) nanospheres encapsulating @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) and @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@DOX@@@) for promoting periodontal and large-sized @<m>DISEASE_Atelosteogenesis_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535395 @@@osseous defects@@@.

citations.NLM: Chang PC, Tai WC, Luo HT, Lai CH, Lin HH, Lin ZJ, Chang YC, Lee BS. Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair. Int J Biol Macromol. 2020 May 7;158():627-635. PMID: 32387616
citations.BibTeX: @article{32387616, title={Core-Shell poly-(D,l-Lactide-co-Glycolide)-chitosan Nanospheres with simvastatin-doxycycline for periodontal and osseous repair.}, author={Chang PC and Tai WC and Luo HT and Lai CH and Lin HH and Lin ZJ and Chang YC and Lee BS}, journal={Int J Biol Macromol}, volume={158}, pages={627-635}}

results.title: Effect of in-situ application of simvastatin gel in surgical management of osseous defects in chronic periodontitis-A randomized clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Effect of in-situ application of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ gel in surgical management of @<m>DISEASE_Atelosteogenesis_type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C535395 @@@osseous defects@@@ in @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@chronic periodontitis@@@-A randomized clinical trial.

citations.NLM: Ranjan R, Patil SR, H R V. Effect of in-situ application of simvastatin gel in surgical management of osseous defects in chronic periodontitis-A randomized clinical trial. J Oral Biol Craniofac Res. 2017 May-Aug;7(2):113-118. PMID: 28706785
